channel.title: ?how do i?
channel.description: [b]How do i put objects in the server. I dont have globalobjects [/b]

item.title: ?how do i?
item.dc:creator: @Josette_Vigee-Lebrun Josette Vigée-Lebrun
item.description:
@Josette_Vigee-Lebrun wrote:

If you don’t have that, try looking in your client.java for this: public void NewObjects() {
Something like this might come up:

makeGlobalObject(2510, 3863, 2783, -3, 10);// Anvil makeGlobalObject(2843, 2964, 61, -3, 10); // Ancient Alter makeGlobalObject(3042, 4843, 2781, 0, 10);// Furnace makeGlobalObject(2378, 3438, 2287, -1, 10);// Obstacle Pipe makeGlobalObject(2380, 3440, 2193, 0, 10);// Chest makeGlobalObject(2383, 3427, 3816, 1, 10);// Kitchen Drawers makeGlobalObject(2572, 3853, 9398, -2, 10); // shopportal makeGlobalObject(3232, 9319, 7324, 0, 10); // blue portal makeGlobalObject(2381, 3438, 4172, -1, 10); // Range makeGlobalObject(2854, 3957, 61, 2, 10); // Ancient Alter makeGlobalObject(2852, 2953, 4389, 0, 10); // shopportal makeGlobalObject(2862, 9956, 2466, -2, 10);// red portal makeGlobalObject(2868, 9883, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2868, 9882, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2868, 9881, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2859, 9881, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2859, 9882, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2864, 9881, 2932, 0, 10); //thing makeGlobalObject(2863, 9881, 2932, 0, 10); //thing makeGlobalObject(2511, 3864, 4172, 0, 10); // Range makeGlobalObject(2895, 3512, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2895, 3509, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2892, 9907, 4626, 0, 10); // Stairs makeGlobalObject(2465, 4817, 4126, 0, 10); // silver chest makeGlobalObject(3306, 3204, 2783, 0, 10); // anvil makeGlobalObject(2521, 4775, 4877, 0, 10); // general stall makeGlobalObject(2519, 4776, 2562, -1, 10); // gem stall makeGlobalObject(2521, 4776, 4878, 0, 10); // scimitar stall makeGlobalObject(2521, 4774, 4876, 0, 10); // magic stall makeGlobalObject(2526, 4777, 2565, -1, 10); // silver stall makeGlobalObject(2522, 4772, 2560, -1, 9); // silk stall makeGlobalObject(2892, 3512, 6552, -3, 10); // magic altar makeGlobalObject(2768, 2756, 362, -3, 10); // barrel makeGlobalObject(3565, 3308, 4156, 0, 10); // portal makeGlobalObject(3303, 3123, 2472, 0, 10); // portal makeGlobalObject(2901, 3557, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(3228, 9318, 7319, 0, 10); // memberportal makeGlobalObject(3114, 9844, 75, -3, 10); // chest makeGlobalObject(3114, 9843, 75, -3, 10); // chest makeGlobalObject(3114, 9842, 75, -3, 10); // chest makeGlobalObject(3118, 9836, 299, -1, 10); // haystack makeGlobalObject(3121, 9842, 2416, -1, 10); // strength makeGlobalObject(3116, 9846, 2213, 0, 10); // bankz makeGlobalObject(2605, 3157, 2213, -1, 10); // banks makeGlobalObject(2976, 3402, 1276, -1, 10); // regtree makeGlobalObject(2982, 3398, 1308, -1, 10); // willowtree makeGlobalObject(2982, 3403, 1307, -1, 10); // mapletree makeGlobalObject(2978, 3404, 1309, -1, 10); // yewtree makeGlobalObject(2979, 3402, 1306, -1, 10); // magictree makeGlobalObject(3114, 9836, 61, 0, 10); // altar makeGlobalObject(3121, 9838, 2513, 0, 10); // target makeGlobalObject(3469, 9488, 76, -3, 10); // kalphitechest makeGlobalObject(2890, 3545, 7288, 0, 10); // gmaulportal makeGlobalObject(3054, 3437, 4483, 0, 10); // bankchest makeGlobalObject(3096, 3468, 767, 0, 10); // chest makeGlobalObject(3426, 3536, 2213, -1, 10); // bankbooth makeGlobalObject(3429, 3539, 104, -2, 10); // openchest makeGlobalObject(3427, 3539, 104, -2, 10); // openchest makeGlobalObject(3306, 3204, 2783, 0, 10); // anvil makeGlobalObject(3101, 3513, 6477, -1, 10); // Bank makeGlobalObject(3286, 3211, 2562, 0, 10); // gem stall makeGlobalObject(3299, 3199, 4878, 0, 10); // scimitar stall makeGlobalObject(3299, 3200, 4876, 0, 10); // magic stall makeGlobalObject(3298, 3205, 2565, 0, 10); // silver stall makeGlobalObject(3082, 3505, 8987, 0, 10); // Cave makeGlobalObject(2542, 3895, 6552, 0, 10); // magic altar makeGlobalObject(2768, 2756, 362, -3, 10); // barrel makeGlobalObject(3565, 3308, 4156, 0, 10); // portal makeGlobalObject(3303, 3123, 2472, 0, 10); // portal makeGlobalObject(2901, 3557, 2213, 0, 10); // bank makeGlobalObject(2901, 3547, 7319, 0, 10); // memberportal makeGlobalObject(3114, 9844, 75, -3, 10); // chest makeGlobalObject(3114, 9843, 75, -3, 10); // chest makeGlobalObject(3114, 9842, 75, -3, 10); // chest makeGlobalObject(3118, 9836, 299, -1, 10); // haystack makeGlobalObject(3121, 9842, 2416, -1, 10); // strength makeGlobalObject(3229, 9319, 2465, -1, 10); // trainportal makeGlobalObject(3230, 9319, 2467, -2, 10);// portal makeGlobalObject(3116, 9846, 2213, 0, 10); // bankz makeGlobalObject(2605, 3157, 2213, -1, 10); // banks makeGlobalObject(2976, 3402, 1276, -1, 10); // regtree makeGlobalObject(2982, 3398, 1308, -1, 10); // willowtree makeGlobalObject(2982, 3403, 1307, -1, 10); // mapletree makeGlobalObject(2978, 3404, 1309, -1, 10); // yewtree makeGlobalObject(2539, 3860, 1306, -1, 10); // magictree makeGlobalObject(2563, 3867, 1306, -1, 10); // magictree makeGlobalObject(2609, 3854, 1306, -1, 10); // magictree makeGlobalObject(2565, 3888, 1306, -1, 10); // magictree makeGlobalObject(3114, 9836, 61, 0, 10); // altar

If this does come up, you would add an object like this:

makeGlobalObject(X coordinate, Y Coordinate, Object ID, way the object is facing (0,-1,-2,-3), 10)

The 10 you just leave alone, i am unsure as to what it’s for though.

Hopefully this helped, if not, you can always send me a PM, or add me on MSN: JosetteVigee@live.com
